metadata.title: CVE-2024-37383 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Roundcube Webmail before 1.5.7 and 1.6.x before 1.6.7 allows XSS via SVGanimate attributes.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-37383` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
roundcube-core - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
roundcube-mysql - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
roundcube-pgsql - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
roundcube-plugins - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.2+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2').
